backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report documenting a logo-loading fix in MauiAppShell.tsx with associated files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or build documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes, applying them across base elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and linking the favicon and main script with BASE_URL-safe asset paths.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in React Query and an authentication gate, and renders MauiAppShell as the root layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper that shows a login screen using Internet Identity when unauthenticated and renders children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Layout shell that renders the header with a base-URL-safe logo loader, navigation, routed content, and footer with signâ€‘out support.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simple navigation bar showing a single Dashboard link with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Modal dialog providing a large multi-section form for entering new resident data and submitting a simplified resident record.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Form dialog for editing resident details with validation, physician management, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays a resident's summary with actions to view profile, toggle status, and delete with confirmation.
Header section for the resident dashboard with title and add-resident button.
Filter and sort controls for residents by room and various sort options.
Grid layout that renders ResidentCard components or an empty-state message.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Tabs for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Placeholder card listing missing reference materials with links and categorized items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, applies global styles, and includes print-specific formatting rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge and normalize Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the residents dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, and add/delete/status update functionality.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data and a function returning medications by resident ID.
Generates mock detailed resident profile data based on basic resident entries, including physicians, contacts, and insurance.
Defines mock resident list entries used for dashboard and profile features.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Contains helper functions for filtering, sorting, and computing KPIs for resident lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays detailed resident profile data with edit, print, and medication interactions using mock data sources.
Renders a print-only resident profile report including personal info, insurance details, and medication tables.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: React page that lists screenshot and design reference requirements using UI components and categorized sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project state, version, and a list of existing features with metadata.
